name: Once Upon A Space
description:
Created by Omar Alkaley

Modifications:

  1. Two Awesome animated skyboxes!
  2. Two distinct levels with different level design!
  3. Switch between Arabic and English languages!
  4. Change the materials of the enemies and the player!
  5. Voice acting performing in both English and Arabic!
  6. Three unique epic music from Zapsplat.com
